main(String[]) - Static method in class Game

makeCoordinates(int, int, String) - Method in class SelfBoard.mouseListener
return coordinates array from (x,y) according to size and alignment of specified ship (identified by its name)
mouseClicked(MouseEvent) - Method in class AttackBoard
This method is called when player clicks on attack board but ignores if the cell is already clicked before.
mouseDragged(MouseEvent) - Method in class SelfBoard.mouseListener
During fleet placement phase, repaint cells if dragged ship can placed
mouseEntered(MouseEvent) - Method in class AttackBoard
 
mouseExited(MouseEvent) - Method in class AttackBoard
 
mouseListener(SelfBoard) - Constructor for class SelfBoard.mouseListener
construct a mouse listener for the entire SelfBoard panel gt
mousePressed(MouseEvent) - Method in class AttackBoard
 
mousePressed(MouseEvent) - Method in class SelfBoard.mouseListener
During fleet placement phase, set shipTemp to the ship that has been pressed on, provided this ship is not already placed
mouseReleased(MouseEvent) - Method in class AttackBoard
 
mouseReleased(MouseEvent) - Method in class SelfBoard.mouseListener
During fleet placement phase, place the dragged ship onto board (if possible) Disable dragging of this ship in future Reset shipTemp to null if entire fleet is placed, fire hidden submit button of this player's Screen
